value.title: Add or Edit Columns When Importing Data from Analysis Services into Power BI
value.excerpt: If you use SQL Server Analysis Services as a data source for Power BI, you have two types of connection; Live Connection or Import Data. value.excerpt: Power BI workspaces are not like old days, that we had Edit access and View access anymore. value.title: Building a Virtual Relationship in Power BI   Basics of TREATAS DAX Function
